scripts.setup: npm install && jspm install && npm run setup-single-spa && jspm install github:single-spa --link && npm run setup-apps
scripts.setup-single-spa: cd .. && npm install && npm run build && jspm link github:single-spa -y && cd examples
scripts.setup-apps: find ./apps -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -type d | xargs -n1 sh -c 'cd $0 && npm run setup'
